resources.string: Wild chickens will run around as as they wish and roost up in trees, under bushes, or just sitting on the ground. While you could just throw your domesticated chickens in your back yard and let them figure it out for themselves, it’s doubtful your neighbors, the city, or your conscience would be happy (although predators would be). Fortunately, meeting your chickens’ habitat and shelter needs isn’t that difficult.Behold the Chicken Coop!

A coalition of 26 groups and 17 individuals today urged the Department of Agriculture to withdraw a proposal that increases poultry processing line speeds and removes hundreds of federal inspectors from poultry processing plants.
